item.description:
What is Glow Bowling you may ask?  Glow bowling is the perfect way to spend a night out with friends.  When they turn off all the lights on the glow bowling side of the building they will turn on their black lights, disco balls, fog machine, and crank up the sounds of today's music and also the best of yesterday.  So let's go rock the night away with some friends.

Cost:

  • $2.75 per pair of rental shoes

  • $28.00 per hour of bowling per lane, $14.00 per half an hour MAXIMUM of 6 people to a lane

Depending how many people sign up we will split up as fair as possible.  To be more festive try to wear something that will GLOW in the dark.

Remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

If you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  We thank you for paying your dues.

In the events that your plans change come back to the site and change your RSVP.

As usual we look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside near the counter.
item.name: Glow bowling is back
